What the hell are you guys doing!?"},{"lineNumber":220806,"originalJapaneseLine":"　置いてくぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"We're leaving you That's not true at all!\""},{"lineNumber":220840,"originalJapaneseLine":"「た、ただ、あの方、年にしては","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-I just think that person, for their age,"},{"lineNumber":220841,"originalJapaneseLine":"　放っておけないところがあって、","translatedEnglishLine":"has a side that you just can't ignore,"},{"lineNumber":220842,"originalJapaneseLine":"　だから目が離せないだけというか」","translatedEnglishLine":"so I just have to keep an eye on them.\""},{"lineNumber":220843,"originalJapaneseLine":"「大体、私なんてただの下働きで！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Besides, I'm just a lowly helper!"},{"lineNumber":220844,"originalJapaneseLine":"　当主である早雲様とはとても……","translatedEnglishLine":"I could never be on the same level as Lord Soun, the head...\""},{"lineNumber":220845,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そ、それに、私からすれば、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A-And besides, to me,"},{"lineNumber":220846,"originalJapaneseLine":"　子供の頃からお世話になっている方で、","translatedEnglishLine":"he's someone who's taken care of me since I was a child,"},{"lineNumber":220847,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そそそ、そんな、好きなんて……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I-I could never... like him...!\""},{"lineNumber":220848,"originalJapaneseLine":"わたわたと慌てていたすずが、","translatedEnglishLine":"Suzu, flustered and panicking,"},{"lineNumber":220849,"originalJapaneseLine":"次第に動きを止める。","translatedEnglishLine":"gradually stopped moving."},{"lineNumber":220850,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":220851,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それに……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"And besides...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 志津香とナギの姉妹が
あなたの顔をジッと見つめてきた。
あなたはナギに頭を撫でられた。
ずっとさせときゃいいのよね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's best to keep it that way."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おい！　テメェら何してやがんだ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey! What the hell are you guys doing!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はいはい、分かったから、がなるんじゃないの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, alright, I got it, no need to shout."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは少し二人の操作方法を覚えた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You learned a little about how to control the two of them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 朝から死国に入り、探索を続けるが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You entered the Dead Nation since morning and continued exploring,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 未だ早雲の姿は見えず。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but Soun's figure was still nowhere to be seen.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そろそろ半日が経とうとしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Almost half a day was about to pass.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 休憩中、すずはボーッと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: During the break, Suzu was absentmindedly

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 空の湯飲みを眺めていた。
リセットが湯飲みにお茶を注ぐのを、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You blankly watched Reset pour tea into the cup.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すずはボーッと眺めていた。
「今はゆっくりお茶を飲んで？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now, just take your time and drink tea, okay?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 先にすずさんが参っちゃうよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you don't, Suzu-san, you'll be the one who breaks down first."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すずは己の心を静めようと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suzu tried to calm her own heart,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 早雲さんが好きなんだねえ」
「ち、ちがっ！　全然そんなことは！」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-I just think that person, for their age,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 放っておけないところがあって、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: has a side that you just can't ignore,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だから目が離せないだけというか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so I just have to keep an eye on them."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「大体、私なんてただの下働きで！
当主である早雲様とはとても……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I could never be on the same level as Lord Soun, the head..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 子供の頃からお世話になっている方で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he's someone who's taken care of me since I was a child,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そそそ、そんな、好きなんて……！」
わたわたと慌てていたすずが、

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

ずっとさせときゃいいのよね」
